intro: Harmsiella, commonly known as the African violet, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Gesneriaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Africa and is characterized by its attractive, velvety leaves and showy, tubular flowers. They thrive in bright, indirect light and require well-draining soil to prevent root rot.
